name: Talking Caillou HD Free
description:
Caillou is a 4-year-old with a big imagination and he wants to be your friend! Play with him and he'll repeat what you say!

Join Caillou on this adventure and enjoy learning about professions in a fun way. Tap the screen to view his entertaining reactions, costumes and animations, learn to conduct a train with your best friend and get Caillou to show you all of his toys!

Each one of his discoveries is a gift of fun and learning for this sweet, curious and playful child. He loves to have fun and learn new things with his innocence, creativity, and also likes to help children his own age keep growing every day.

Caillou is always ready for new adventures to grow and learn!

WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH TALKING CAILLOU
- Caillou repeats what you say!
- Tap the screen to see his entertaining reactions!
- Learn to conduct your best friend’s train!
- Discover all of Caillou’s surprise gifts!
- Discover the fun profession guessing mini-game!

IMPORTANT NOTE FOR USERS
Your iPod Touch, iPhone or iPad should have a microphone or headphones with a microphone. If not, the voice repetition function will not work properly.
